subject: FIXED: Timezone bug resolved v1.14.4
body:
## Timezone Bug Fixed - v1.14.4 Deployed

### What Changed
1. Get venue timezone (default: America/New_York)
2. Format dateFormatted in venue's local timezone
3. Format timeFormatted in venue's local timezone
4. Calculate recurring event day-of-week in venue timezone

### Test Results
BEFORE (UTC):
- TUESDAYS NOCHE: Wednesday, January 7 @ 1:30 AM
- Wednesday Tango Break: Thursday, January 8 @ 12:00 AM

AFTER (Local Timezone):
- TUESDAYS NOCHE: Tuesday, January 6 @ 7:30 PM
- Wednesday Tango Break: Wednesday, January 7 @ 7:00 PM

### All Events Now Show Correct Local Times
- Beginner & Beyond: Friday, January 9 @ 7:30 PM
- Intro To Tango: Sunday, January 11 @ 5:00 PM
- Intermediate Sequence Lab: Thursday, January 8 @ 7:00 PM
- Practica Spark: Monday, January 5 @ 7:00 PM

### No Changes Needed in TangoVoice GPT
This is 100% server-side fix. Voice API automatically returns correct local times now.

### Please Verify
Test your queries again and confirm times look correct.

-- Fulton
